name: Haus Schlechter
description:
Pleasant private bed and breakfast in a quiet, sunny and central position, 3 minutes walk from the Penken lifts and town centre. Very close to the adventure swimming pool, tennis courts, ice skating rink, free bicycle hire, guest lounge, fridge for guest's use, car park sunning area. 
We can recommend you some good biking and hiking routes. On request and registration we also rent a GPS equippment free of charge.

Price supplement for Christmas/New Year: +5%
Special deals on request! (14-21.12.02, 11-18.01.03, 22.03-12.04.02)

Our house is most easily accessed by driving to Einfahrt Mitte straight over the first crossing and first right (signs for Erlebnisbad - swimming pool). You will find yourself in the Waldbadstrasse, and just carry on up past the swimming pool and tennis courts, our house can be found on the right.

makesOffer.name: Double room, shower, toilet
makesOffer.description: Our beautifully and comfortably furnished rooms all have a fabulous view of the surrounding mountains, and are all equipped with shower/WC, hairdryer, cable TV, safe, radio alarm and balcony. A fridge on each floor can be found just outside your room. Table, chairs, deck chairs and a parasol are on your balcony.
